metadata.title: The Wizard's Tower
metadata.description: A custom game demonstrating engine extensibility.
metadata.author: Extended Game Example

locations.name: Overgrown Garden
locations.description: You stand in an overgrown garden. Weeds choke the flowerbeds and ivy climbs the crumbling walls. A weathered stone path leads north to a tower entrance.

north.name: stone path
north.description: A weathered stone path winds through the overgrown garden toward the tower entrance.

locations.name: Tower Entrance
locations.description: You are in the entrance hall of a tall stone tower. Dust motes dance in shafts of light from narrow windows. A wooden door leads east. The garden is to the south.

south.name: garden archway
south.description: An ivy-covered archway leads back to the overgrown garden.

up.name: spiral staircase
up.description: A worn spiral staircase of grey stone winds upward into the tower.

east.name: wooden door
east.description: A simple wooden door leads to what appears to be a storage area.

locations.name: Storage Room
locations.description: A small dusty storage room. Old crates are stacked against the walls. A door leads west back to the entrance.

west.name: wooden door
west.description: The wooden door leads back to the tower entrance hall.

locations.name: Wizard's Library
locations.description: Towering bookshelves line the circular room. A large desk sits near the window. Stairs lead down and up.

down.name: spiral staircase
down.description: The spiral staircase winds downward to the entrance hall below.

up.name: ornate door
up.description: An ornate door covered in glowing runes bars the way to the upper sanctum.

locations.name: Wizard's Sanctum
locations.description: The wizard's private sanctum at the top of the tower. Arcane symbols cover the floor. A large window overlooks the land below.

down.name: ornate door
down.description: The ornate rune-covered door leads back down to the library.

items.name: trowel
items.description: A rusty garden trowel, still serviceable for digging.

items.name: bench
items.description: A weathered stone bench, covered in moss. It looks sturdy enough to stand on.

items.name: tree
items.description: An old oak tree with thick branches. You might be able to climb it if you had something to stand on.

items.name: star
items.description: A crystalline star that glows with inner light, nestled in the tree branches.

items.name: mat
items.description: A faded welcome mat with the words 'Speak Friend' barely visible.

items.name: umbrella
items.description: A dusty old umbrella with a carved handle.

items.name: crate
items.description: A wooden shipping crate, its lid pried open.

items.name: key
items.description: A small iron key with 'STORAGE' etched on it.

items.name: rope
items.description: A coil of old but sturdy hemp rope.

items.name: desk
items.description: A large oak desk covered in papers and strange instruments.

items.name: spellbook
items.description: A leather-bound spellbook. Arcane runes shimmer on its cover.

items.name: stand
items.description: An ornate silver stand with intricate engravings.

items.name: ball
items.description: A crystal ball. Mist swirls within its depths.

items.name: key
items.description: A golden key that glows faintly with magic.

items.name: altar
items.description: A stone altar with channels carved into its surface.

items.name: wand
items.description: A slender wand of pale wood, tipped with a glowing crystal.

items.name: door
items.description: An ornate door covered in glowing runes.

locks.description: A magical lock that pulses with energy.
locks.name: Sanctum Lock

properties.description: Through the large arched window, you see rolling hills and distant forests stretching to the horizon. Birds circle lazily in the clear sky.

player.name: Tam
player.description: A teenage farmhand who stumbled upon the wizard's tower while taking a walk through the countryside. Never been inside a place like this before - everything is strange and exciting and maybe a little scary. Knows they probably shouldn't be here, but can't resist exploring.
